channel.title: Ridz settings for my comp? what do you recommend?(read for info)
channel.description: im using windows 7 home version, whats the recommended settings? i read the instructions i am using the "Windows Classic" theme but anything else recommended?

item.title: Ridz settings for my comp? what do you recommend?(read for info)
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:2, topic:369843”]I’ve logged several thousand hours off RID(Mainly MTA)

I’ve never had a problem with it~200m+ made and a ton of mage XP.

RID has great bots, it’s probably just your setting’s which messed it up.[/quote]
ok, ill try messing around with the settings.
